Class javachart.chart.IndColumnChart 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Chart
           |
           +----javachart.chart.BarChart
                   |
                   +----javachart.chart.IndColumnChart
public class IndColumnChart
extends BarChart
A derivative of conventional column charts that draws bars using a separate color for each bar. This is done by using the Bar's drawInd method to draw bars. Multiple datasets are clustered side-by-side.
See Also:
BarChart, Bar

IndColumnChart()
constructs a default chart
